10/10 as a NTR connoisseur, this hits hard both in the kokoro and the balls... the artstyle is epic and the pacing is nice and quick... love it

2/10. Although the art style is good the characters (mainly the son and husband) are lacking, neither of them showed initiative in this rape situation and just let it happen, the one attempt the son had was less that half-assed and the husband just looked nervous. The plots progression also stopped  early on as well, and even though the objective of the plot was mainly rushed through in the first part, it felt like more could have been done to keep readers engaged.
 TLDR: It sucks, with the only decent part being the artwork.

4/10, the art style is good, there is a good base for a character to start from, but it doesn't do anywhere, the mother just becomes what she is after a page or 2, no development, the dad is a bad character. The main character is also a spaghetti character, he has a good base to start a story from, but he doesn't do anything except that one time he tried to stop his mother (albeit very badly).
